reference.shortdesc: The concept element is the top-level element for a topic that answers the question what is?

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Concepts provide background information that users must know before they can successfully work with a product or interface. Often, a concept is an extended definition of a major abstraction such as a process or function. It might also have an example or a graphic, but generally the structure of a concept is fairly simple.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The concept element is specialized from topic. It is defined in the concept module.
